name: drawPrimitives(_:vertexStart:vertexCount:instanceCount:baseInstance:)
desc: Encodes a command to render a number of instances of primitives using vertex data in contiguous array elements, starting from the base instance.Required.
declaration:
func drawPrimitives(_ primitiveType: MTLPrimitiveType, 
        vertexStart: Int, 
        vertexCount: Int, 
      instanceCount: Int, 
       baseInstance: Int)
